casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alden Jerome HARDEN. No. 427A94-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 18, 2005. Nora Henry Hargrove, Margaret Creasy Ciardella, Hampstead, CA, for Alden Jerome Harden. Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of October 2005 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 20th day of October 2005 to file and serve his/her response *269with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of October 2005."
